title: Python World Class
description: Python programming workshop from basics to advanced level. Suitable for beginners and experienced developers. Includes hands-on project practice.
location: Andrew N. Liveris Building, Computer Lab 46-441

title: Python Programming Workshop
description: Python programming workshop from basics to advanced level. Suitable for beginners and experienced developers. Includes hands-on project practice.
location: Andrew N. Liveris Building, Computer Lab 46-441

title: AI Research Frontiers Sharing
description: UQ AI research team shares latest research achievements, including machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing and other cutting-edge developments.
location: Sir Llew Edwards Building, Learning Theatre 14-132

title: Student Social Gathering
description: UQ Connect user gathering to meet new friends, share learning experiences, and build professional networks. Free refreshments and entertainment provided.

title: Mental Health and Stress Management
description: Learn effective stress management techniques and understand the importance of mental health. Suitable for all students, especially during exam periods.

title: Database Design Best Practices
description: Deep dive into database design principles, including relational database design, performance optimization, data modeling and other advanced topics.

title: Entrepreneurship and Innovation Thinking
description: Learn about the entrepreneurship process and innovative thinking methods. Successful entrepreneurs will share their experiences. Suitable for students with entrepreneurial aspirations.

title: Cybersecurity Awareness Training
description: Improve cybersecurity awareness and learn how to protect personal information and data security. Includes real case analysis and protection techniques.

title: UQ Art Museum Twilight Tour
description: Guided evening tour of the UQ Art Museum featuring the latest exhibitions from local and international artists. Includes curator talk and refreshments.
location: UQ Art Museum, St Lucia Campus

title: Lakeside Sunset Music Sessions
description: Relax by the UQ Lakes and enjoy live acoustic performances from student musicians. Picnic rugs and light snacks provided.

title: Campus Culture & Food Market
description: Explore international food stalls, artisan crafts, and community showcases from UQ student societies across different faculties.

title: Gallery & Design Innovation Showcase
description: See graduating students from the School of Architecture, Design and Planning present their final projects. Includes interactive installations and networking with industry partners.
